SELECT rsi.id, rsi.circuit_code, rsi.serial_number, rsi.service_id, ci.code_content, rsi.instance_id, rsi.region_id, ord.order_id, wo.wo_id, ut.id as tacheId, ut.tache_name, pds.pub_date_name, rsi.system_resource, rsi.is_oldres, WO.WO_STATE, WO.DEAL_USER_ID, wo.disp_obj_id, WO.DISP_OBJ_TYE, rsi.create_date, wo.COMP_USER_ID FROM gom_bdw_res_supplement_info rsi LEFT JOIN gom_order ord ON ord.order_id = rsi.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_wo wo ON wo.order_id = ord.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S ws ON ws.id = wo.ps_id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = ws.tache_id LEFT JOIN gom_ord_key_info ki ON ki.order_id = ord.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_pub_date_s pds ON pds.pub_date_id = ki.specialty_code AND pds.df_type = 'SPECIALTY_TYPE' LEFT JOIN gom_bdw_code_info ci ON ci.code_value = rsi.service_id AND ci.code_type = 'product_code' WHERE wo.disp_obj_id <> '-2000' AND rsi.system_resource in ('flow-schedule-lt','sec-flow-schedule-lt')
AND rsi.circuit_code like '%'||#{circuitCode}||'%'
AND rsi.serial_number like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
AND rsi.service_id = #{productType}
UNION ALL SELECT rsi.id, rsi.circuit_code, rsi.serial_number, rsi.service_id, ci.code_content, rsi.instance_id, rsi.region_id, ord.order_id, wo.wo_id, ut.id as tacheId, ut.tache_name, pds.pub_date_name, rsi.system_resource, rsi.is_oldres, WO.WO_STATE, WO.DEAL_USER_ID, wo.disp_obj_id, WO.DISP_OBJ_TYE, rsi.create_date, wo.COMP_USER_ID FROM gom_bdw_res_supplement_info rsi LEFT JOIN gom_order ord ON ord.parent_order_id = rsi.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_wo wo ON wo.order_id = ord.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S ws ON ws.id = wo.ps_id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = ws.tache_id LEFT JOIN gom_ord_key_info ki ON ki.order_id = ord.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_pub_date_s pds ON pds.pub_date_id = ki.specialty_code AND pds.df_type = 'SPECIALTY_TYPE' LEFT JOIN gom_bdw_code_info ci ON ci.code_value = rsi.service_id AND ci.code_type = 'product_code' WHERE wo.disp_obj_id <> '-2000' AND rsi.system_resource in ('flow-schedule-lt','sec-flow-schedule-lt')
AND rsi.circuit_code like '%'||#{circuitCode}||'%'
AND rsi.serial_number like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
AND rsi.service_id = #{productType}
